species.name: Droide
species.special: Droids do not need to eat, sleep, or breathe, and are unaffected by toxins or poisons.Droids have a cybernetic implant cap of 6 instead of their Brawn rating.

species.name: Gand
species.special: Gands begin the game with one rank in Discipline. They still may not train Discipline above rank 2 during character creation

species.name: Rodians
species.special: Rodians begin the game with one rank in Survival. They still may not train Survival above rank 2 during character creation. Rodians start with one rank in the Expert Tracker talent
